alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Eastern Magic Valley; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 12:04AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with winds to 50 mph and locally heavy rain will impact portions of west central Teton, southeastern Blaine, northwestern Caribou, southwestern Fremont, Jefferson, northwestern Bannock, southeastern Butte, northern Power, western Bonneville, Madison, south central Clark and Bingham Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1203 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Aberdeen to 9 miles northwest of Rose to 14 miles southeast of Bone. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, western Pocatello, Rexburg, Blackfoot, Rigby, Ririe Reservoir, Chesterfield Reservoir, Goshen, American Falls Reservoir, Terreton, Lorenzo, northern Blackfoot Reservoir, Chubbuck, Ammon, Shelley, Aberdeen, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon and Menan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
